text: 9|124|oru (putiya) attiyayam arulappattal â€˜â€˜unkalil yarutaiya nampikkaiyai itu atikappatuttiyatu?'' Enru ketkakkutiyavarkalum avarkalil palar irukkinranar. Meyyakave evarkal nampikkaik kontirukkirarkalo avarkalutaiya nampikkaiyai (itu) atikappatuttiye vittatu. Itaip parri avarkal makilcciyataikinranar
